prompts: Create a playful monkey-like Pokemon with bright colors and a mischievous look.
I want a small, agile Pokemon that can climb trees and throw objects.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon with a fierce expression and a strong stance.
Make a Pokemon that loves to play in the forests and has a cheeky personality.
Imagine a bipedal creature with a vibrant tail and energetic movements.
Design a Pokemon that is quick and competitive, perfect for battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies agility and has a knack for mischief.
